title: My Pet Pal
subtitle: iOS mobile app to keep track of your puppy's activities and well-being.
description: Since I started intensive bootcamp study, I forgot to take my dog outside several times in the morning. This always made my nicest boy friend grumpy, so I decided to make this app. This mobile app enables users to collaboratively manage dog's daily activities. I worked with an UX designer and an UI designer for better user experience. I designed database, and worked on backend APIs, front-end design, frontend and backend connection, error handling, and styling.
takeAway: One of the challenges was to distributing time for each user story. Handling numerous asynchronous actions. It was fun to build a polished iOS app with React Native. Improving user experience by implementing Keyboard Aware Scroll View /
technology: React Native, Redux, Expo, Node.js, Knex,  Ajax, PostgreSQL
videoTitle: My Pet Pal - React Native IOS App Demo

title: iOS Movie App
subtitle: iOS mobile app to save and manage a list of your favorite movies.
description: Worked on fetching data from APIs, utilizing a 3rd party library, and styling an app.
takeAway: Building layouts with Flexbox / Using Expo for real device visual testing including iPhone and iPad

title: Invoice Generator
subtitle: Invoice generator app for freelancer developers.
description: Collaborated with a team of 4 developers to create an invoice generator app for freelance developers. Was responsible for backend routing and frontend reading invoice page and delete invoice function.
takeAway: Implementing authorization and authentication / Improving user experience by handling errors / Designing and building RESTful APIs
technology: JavaScript, Bulma, Node.js, Knex, Ajax, PostgreSQL

title: Discover Local
subtitle: Hackathon Project : Traval application for international travelors
description: The challenge was to create an innovative travel application using Discover Card’s APIs in order to help travelers around the world. Our solution was to connect travelers with someone local who speaks the same language and also know the country's culture.
takeAway: Implementing external APIs with OAuth2.0 / Collaborating as a cross-functional team, under intense time constraints to produce a product

title: Singular Focus
subtitle: Web application to manage team work and tasks
description: Worked with a team of 3 to develop an app that enables users to manage and focus tasks and managers to have an at-a-glance overview of the team’s activities.
takeAway: Implementing external APIs with OAuth2.0 / Collaborating as a cross-functional team, under intense time constraints to produce a product
technology: JavaScript, React, Redux, React-Bulma, Node.js, Knex, Ajax, PostgreSQL

title: React BookStore
subtitle: Prototype local bookstore app
description: Prototype Local Bookstore app for managing inventory, search books, and checkout books.
takeAway: Implementing external APIs with OAuth2.0 / Collaborating as a cross-functional team, under intense time constraints to produce a product

title: Puppy Love
subtitle: Frontend prototype for dog adoption website
description: Worked with one other developer to create a frontend prototype for a website for dog adoption.
takeAway: I learned how to work with other developers. I discovered that I really enjoy designing website by completing this project.

title: Survavial Tool in America
subtitle: Unit Converter
description: Unit Converter is a simple tool converts between 13 essential units that are used in daily life in the world.
takeAway: I learned how to use local storage by doing this project.
